original: intros a b. split. - intros H. specialize bezout with 1 a b. intros Hbezout. destruct Hbezout as [u [v Hgcd]]. exists u, v. apply Hgcd. - intros [u [v H']]. destruct H' as [H' | H']. + left. exists u, v. apply H'. + right. exists u, v. apply H'.
